message.body: Not bad. Been about to make breakfast for about an hour now. LOL. You?
Good! My younger brother is visiting me and we're about to go to the farmer's market, so a pretty laid-back day
Nice. Definitely a fan of farmer's markets. I went after work on Thursday. (I'm in Rochester, NY, and we have a couple of good markets here.)
No, but I will be in the fall. Starting a master's program in psych.
Awesome! I'm at the university of Illinois right now, BA linguistics
Cool! I took a few linguistics classes undergrad. I'll be out shopping for most of the afternoon, but I wish I could talk more.
That was a productive shopping trip. How was yours?
